title: Lucky break at Wrest Point Casino
creator_credit: Peter Kay, Roger Clarke and Tasmanian State Film Unit
brief_description: A promotional film featuring Wrest Point Casino in Hobart. An American personality briefly gives his impressions of the city of Hobart, including the harbour, restaurants, the casino and the history of the city.
creator_credit_for_label: Peter Kay, Roger Clarke and Tasmanian State Film Unit
